definition: a vertical lever that can move freely in many directions along a single axis, used to control movement in computer and video games
details:
noun
- a vertical lever that can move freely in many directions along a single axis, used to control movement in computer and video games
= example: a vertical lever that can move freely in many directions along a single axis, used to control movement in computer and video games
- a lever used by a pilot to control the ailerons and elevators of an airplane
= example: a lever used by a pilot to control the ailerons and elevators of an airplane
= synonyms: stick
